humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, the sentinel lymph node (SLN #2) is positive for carcinoma (1/1). Based on the new rules provided, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has one sentinel lymph node (SLN #2) positive for metastatic carcinoma (1/1), and there are no other non-sentinel lymph nodes reported with metastases. This corresponds to an N1 stage based on the AJCC Cancer Staging Manual, 7th Edition.
